resources.string:
About FoundYou
--------------
FoundYou: A Parent Controlling App
Version: 1.0

Purpose:
FoundYou helps parents track and monitor their child\'s safety by providing real-time location updates and parental controls.

Developer:
Developed by GhostByte.
Privacy:
Your privacy is important to us. For detailed information on how we handle your data, please read our Privacy Policy.

Terms:
By using this app, you agree to our Terms and Conditions.

Acknowledgments:
Built using Google Maps and Fused Location API.

Â© 2024 FoundYou. All Rights Reserved.

Frequently Asked Questions:
1. If I hide the app icon, how can I uninstall the app?
If you've hidden the app icon, you can uninstall it by going to your device's "Settings" > "Apps" > "Manage Apps" and then selecting "FoundYou" to uninstall it.

2. Why hasn't the location been updated for a while?
If the location hasn't updated for a long time, it could be because the device's connection or location services have been turned off. Also, if the phone is switched off, the app will not be able to update the location.

3. Should I remove battery restrictions?
Yes, removing battery restrictions is important. The app needs to run continuously, and if battery optimization is enabled, it might restrict the app's background activity. The app doesn't drain a lot of battery but will not work properly if the device's battery is low.

4. Why isn't the app working properly?
The app may not function properly if it doesn't have all the requested permissions. Please ensure all permissions are granted. If problems persist, try reinstalling the app and granting the necessary permissions.

5. Will the app work on Huawei devices?
Currently, the app might not work properly on some Huawei devices. We are working on a fix for future updates.

6. Should I keep the app up to date?
Yes, it's essential to keep the app updated to ensure you have the latest features and fixes. Check for updates regularly.

For more information, see the About section.
